author: gartung
body: Updated edmModuleAllocJsonToCircles.py to treat ESmodules that appear in edmModuleAllocMonitorAnalyze.py output json files in 'event' and other transitions as their own transition "event setup".  These "event setup" transitions are identified by the presence of  `["record"]["name"] ` field in the list element.
title: PerfTools/AllocMonitory: Update edmModuleAllocJsonToCircles.py to add "event setup" transition for ESModules
